description:
“Menstrual Equity” is now a thing and nothing makes sense anymore.

The City of Victoria posted a very serious X post claiming that they are joining “efforts to reduce the stigma around periods & work towards menstrual equity.” They will achieve said “stigma” by lighting City Hall red and displaying the “period flag”.

Raising the "Period Pride" flag in Sault Ste. Marie, Ontario.

Canada has left the building.

📷@joshryanjames pic.twitter.com/i904PtO0N0
— dahlia kurtz ✡︎ דליה קורץ (@DahliaKurtz) May 30, 2024
title: Of course, Canada is caught flying this period pride flag in the name of (sigh) “menstrual equity"

description:
The Supreme Court ruled in favor of the NRA after they filed a lawsuit, "alleging that a New York official violated the group’s First Amendment rights when she urged banks and insurance companies not to do business with it in the wake of the 2018 shooting at a Florida high school."

Why does it seem as if New York officials never like to follow this little thing called the “Constitution”?


🚨BREAKING🚨

9-0 victory at the Supreme Court in NRA v. Vullo—a case where GOA and GOF filed an a
title: SCOTUS defies New York, UNANIMOUSLY rules in favor of the NRA in crucial second amendment case

description:
In Los Angeles County, your religious beliefs "do not matter”, according to a complaint filed by a Christian lifeguard who refused to fly the pride flag.

Captain Jeffrey Little is suing Los Angeles County, claiming that city officials "forced him to choose between his job and his faith," according to Fox News.

Last year the Los Angeles County Board of Supervisors passed a motion that forces county employees to fly the “Progress Pride Flag” at all city facilities. Little requested religious accommodation but was de
title: Lifeguard sues Los Angeles for religious discrimination after they REFUSED to fly the Pride flag

description:
You know, the left wouldn't have to set fire to the constitution and our legal system and convict their biggest political rival, if they thought they were the least bit confident in the election. But as Trump said at Friday’s press conference, “Nov. 5 is going to be the most important day in the history of our country.”

The left is notorious for doubling down on things that blatantly don’t work. And no matter how many times they throw bogus charges at Trump, they don’t seem to get the picture that it’s only helping him. So while they believe they positively made history by convicting him on 34 bogus charges, that not even Manhattan's overweight district attorney can fully explain, Trump got
title: Sham Trial Backfires BIG As Trump Vows To Save America During Defiant Press Conference

description:
Pride month will officially begin tomorrow but Spokane city officials are warming up extra early with crocodile tears over a “desecrated” pride mural that no one cares about.

Unfortunately, in America we have more pride crosswalks that represent a flag dedicated to degenerate sexual preferences than we do of the American flag. Because, according to the left, America is not a symbol of freedom; debauchery is.

A pride crosswalk in SPOKANE, Wash. was set on fire, and city officials won’t shut up because silence is violence.

BREAKING: A manhunt is underway in Washington for several suspects who "desecrated" a Spokane pride mural.

City leaders held a conference on the UNSPEAKABLE tragedy of the mural.

Some leaders broke down and
title: Watch: City officials (aka grown adults) cry crocodile tears over "defaced" Pride mural, declares manhunt underway

description:
Yesterday was the first time in American History that a former president was convicted of felony crimes after President Donald Trump was convicted on 34 charges of falsifying business records. Today’s show breaks down the left’s latest weaponization of the justice system against a political opponent.

"There are few days in life where you remember very clearly where you were, who you were with, and about what was going on around you that you don't remember on most days," Gerald A said. "May 30, 2024, will be one of those days.”

As of writing this, Trump has raised nearly $35 million in
title: Watch: Does Donald Trump's Conviction Signal The End Of America?!?

description:
Yesterday, President Donald Trump was found guilty on 34 charges of falsifying business records. They’re already calling him “Convicted Felon Trump” on CNN. We can’t wait to see how much money he raised overnight! With this latest installment of the weaponization of the justice system against a political opponent, the left have once again all but ensured Donald J Trump wins in November.

description:
Subscribe to Louder with Crowder on Rumble! Download the app on Apple and Google Play.

Donald Trump was found guilty on Thursday. They got him on 17 counts of beating Hillary Clinton in 2016 and 17 counts of running against Joe Biden in 2024. His sentencing? Four days before the GOP convention in July. It is both not surprising yet still maddening. But it's where we're at right now. Trump has a press conference scheduled for Friday morning, though he addressed the court decisions briefly last evening.

RIGGED. pic.twitter.com/8rX2P22iu0
title: "These Democrats will rue the day": Three #TrumpTrial reactions to get you ready for what comes next
